text: Asif Šarić (born 15 January 1965) is a Bosnian retired football midfielder and manager.Weltfussball He is currently the assistant coach for Hannover 96. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina footballers Category:FK Sloboda Tuzla players Category:Arminia Bielefeld players Category:FC Basel players Category:Sportfreunde Siegen players Category:SC Paderborn 07 players Category:SV Wilhelmshaven players Category:Bonner SC players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Swiss Super League players Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Switzerland Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina expatriate sportspeople in Switzerland Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina emigrants to Germany Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina football managers Category:Bonner SC managers Category:Hannover 96 non-playing staff Category:Hannover 96 managers Category:2. Bundesliga managers
title: Asif Šarić
